hero.title: Prayer Requests
hero.subtitle: We believe in the power of prayer. Share your prayer request and let us stand with you in faith.

intro: At Increasing Faith Ministries, we believe that prayer is a powerful way to connect with God and experience His presence in our lives. Whether you're facing a challenge, celebrating a victory, or simply need encouragement, we're here to pray with you and for you.
confirmationMessage: Thank you for sharing your prayer request with us. Our ministry team will be praying for you. Remember, God hears every prayer and He is faithful!

scripture.quote: Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours.
